news: Dear Users :) The next version wil include multiple languages :) We need people who want to help translate the app and/or check already translated text. We have the following languages till now in the new version English, Dutch, German, Greek, Spanish, French, Japanees and Chinees. Want to help please contact me, also to add new languages. 73 PD2EMC

header: DMR User Database Windows (1.0.20241222) (134) getting ready for production :) *fixed windows installer**dont show older update news then today*
news: Dear Testers :) want too play with the windows version check: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1phdBYsV0bFWFn_FGd5cigQKR5XkQFmrK/view?usp=drive_link if you get dll errors after starting the app, install the x86 or x64 dll's within the installer.

header: DMR User Database MacOS (1.0.20241222) (134) getting ready for production :) *fixed windows installer**dont show older update news then today*
news: Dear Testers :) want too play with a mac version check this link : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cdYUKairqGOvbiEDEWqJF8Z5-yMmZwFb/view?usp=drive_link
